backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining chatroom and messaging functionality with access control, blob storage, user profiles with 8-character alphanumeric IDs, reactions, replies, and chatroom deletion with password protection.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting frontend username display updates to match the backend's 8-character alphanumeric format across MessageBubble, Header, and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, pages, and configuration, highlighting the 8-character alphanumeric username generation and display logic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags, viewport configuration for mobile, and versioned script tag (v=203) to force production refresh.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup for lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditionally hiding header/footer on admin pages and providing 404 handling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for selecting user avatars via file upload, Giphy search with debounced trending/search results, or removal, with initials fallback derived from username.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface with collapsible header, pinned video area, scrollable message list filtering out Creator messages without media, reply functionality, and auto-scroll on new messages.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing live status, participant count, message count, and last activity timestamp. Fetches Twitch thumbnails and Twitter oEmbed previews on mount.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Modal dialog for creating new chatrooms with topic, description, category selection, and media upload/URL input (supports image upload, YouTube/Twitch videos, and Twitter posts). Includes Twitter widget integration and video URL validation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with logo, username editing functionality (max 8 chars with progress bar), avatar picker button, and back-to-lobby navigation when in a chatroom.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing; authentication is explicitly not used in this anonymous application.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with avatar, timestamp, reactions, pin/unpin functionality, reply support, and embedded media (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter, Giphy, images, voice messages). Includes emoji reaction picker and message highlighting.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Chat message input component with text area (2000 char limit), image upload, Giphy GIF search, voice recording, and auto-detection of YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URLs in message text.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video in an embedded iframe with an unpin button at the top of the chatroom.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component that renders an audio player with waveform visualization, play/pause controls, and a progress slider. Handles audio playback state, duration tracking, and ensures only one audio plays at a time across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: React hook that returns a debounced version of a value, delaying updates until the specified delay period has passed without changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: React hook that ensures fresh chatroom data on first load by purging stale cache entries (especially empty arrays) and forcing a refetch when the actor becomes ready. Exposes a recovery-in-progress signal for loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle. Provides authentication status and identity to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for chatroom and message operations including fetching, searching, filtering by category, creating chatrooms, sending messages, and managing reactions. Handles username generation, localStorage persistence, and query key normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file with Tailwind directives, CSS custom properties for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, mobile-specific input styles to prevent zoom, and custom styling for voice message player range inputs.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration, including API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility function to format numbers in compact notation (k, M, B) for display, handling both number and bigint types.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from the Giphy API, returning structured GIF data with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for dynamic html2canvas library loading.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images using canvas, preserving orientation and only returning compressed version if smaller than original.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON data and extracts safe preview fields (author, text, image) without DOM manipulation, with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and versioning.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching logic.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail URLs for YouTube, Twitch (clips/VODs/streams), and Twitter/X posts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for managing and deleting chatrooms, protected by password authentication stored in sessionStorage with filtering and bulk operations.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Displays a single chatroom with loading states, error handling, and automatic view count increment. Renders ChatArea component when chatroom data is successfully loaded.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page that displays a searchable, filterable list of chatrooms with category badges. Includes create chatroom dialog and handles client-side filtering of chatroom data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme utilities, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking feature requests to change username display from current format to 8-character alphanumeric format (mixed case) in both backend generation and frontend display components.
